name: Brad Nye Prototypes
description:
The Changing Seasons - using the visuals provided when hitting WASD, guess the code at the end to unlock a secret 

The Space Between Us - Light up the world like you do every day. Close the space between you and those around you. Click on planets to go between then and use the mouse to drag forward and back to zoom in  and out

Revenge Was Sweet - two player local vs game. P1 uses WAD to move and jump, P2 uses IJL to move and jump. Get behind the other player and hit them to score, but don't kill them too much or their shutdown score on you will grow

Tongue Twisted Problems - Requires mic. Make sure to not get tongue twisted as you repeat these tongue twisters into your mic. The lower the time it takes to say them, the higher your score.

All of these are made for windows.
